Started laying the groundwork to add sensors to CI:

* ~~Pipelines in this PR~~
* ~~[release-tools PR](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/release-tools/pull-requests/708/add-fuel-tools-and-sensors-to-ign-gazebo/diff)~~
* [homebrew-simulation PR](https://github.com/osrf/homebrew-simulation/pull/564) - pending zmq fix
* ~~It's already there on [gazebodistro](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebodistro/src/41cecb2aff559c9f112223b91df087efedcd5da8/ign-default.yaml?at=default&fileviewer=file-view-default#ign-default.yaml-34)~~

~~We will likely need a new ign-sensors release before this all can be merged.~~ It's being nightli-ed
content.html:
Started laying the groundwork to add sensors to CI:

  • Pipelines in this PR
  • release-tools PR
  • homebrew-simulation PR - pending zmq fix
  • It's already there on gazebodistro

We will likely need a new ign-sensors release before this all can be merged. It's being nightli-ed
